clean_data: IT INFRA CONSULTANT IT INFRA CONSULTANT Network Administrator Flower Mound TX Dear SirMadam Re Application for Network Administrator I am writing to express my interest in interviewing for the position of Network Administrator During my 8 years of experience as a Network Administrator I have become an expert in both LAN and WAN I think this expertise coupled with my overall skillset makes me a great fit for your organization Particularly I am an expert in network design and security devices implementation users training and network maintenance on a daytoday basis Additionally I have a track record of reducing overheads and expenditures by procuring most efficient and economical devices and utilizing limited resources efficiently As an individual I am highly organized and committed to achieve organizational goals I know it is impossible to work without proper coordination in a large organization and I always try to develop a cordial relationship with my fellow workers so that a positive work environment can be maintained Furthermore I am professionally certified by Cisco CCNA and from Microsoft MCSE My resume is attached for your review I feel that I have excellent handon skills as a Jack of all trades with IT environment I am available for an interview anytime you want as I think that a personal meeting for discussing this job further will be helpful You can email me at chamjoheunhugmailcom or call me at  Thank you for reviewing my cover letter and considering my application Yours Sincerely Raymond Chung Authorized to work in the US for any employer Work Experience IT INFRA CONSULTANT TEXONE SOLUTION January 2018 to June 2019 Recommended strategic process improvement measures to reduce the number of incident management tickets and enhance customer service locally Consulted with clients on equipment and software procurement and requisitions Research clients business process and advised client on how to make their process more efficient Provided total office automation solutions including system design LANWAN networking training troubleshooting and boardlevel repair for clients INFORMATION SECURITY MANAGER LG ELECTRONICS June 2015 to December 2017 Reported to CFO and provided leadership and oversight of all IT projects including planning implementation budgets and project closure Managed information security program that ensured security become engrained in planned and ongoing IT and processes Provided training to over 200 end users on security best practices and simple computer Provided Layer 2 connectivity to end users as well as maintain Layer 3 connectivity to our ISP Tracked maintained and inventoried over 2 million worth of IT Systems including a variety of routers switches servers and computers Facilitated creation of IT project definition documents and plans for each project and ensured stakeholders reviewed and approved scope and timelines Managed information security projects including planning and deployment of new processes and technologies in area of intrusion detection and response deployment and management of authentication tokens and VPNs and vulnerability assessment and remediation practices NETWORKSYSTEM ADMINISTRATOR Parc1 Dev September 2010 to May 2015 Responsible for the installation configuration and maintenance of all network infrastructure equipment such as Cisco routers and firewalls and switches as well as physicalvirtual Windows 2008 servers Configured and installed all desktops laptops and peripherals Active Directory administration Fiber channel SAN administration Blackberry Enterprise Server administration Administered and supported backup and recovery operations Provided end user support Configured and support Cisco 2800 series Router in ATM over IP MPLS implementation Implemented sitetosite failover VPNs for geographically dispersed locations Configuring and installation of Cisco Switches by implementing VLAN over OSPF Designed implemented and supervised VPN administration though the process of a VPN concentrator for remote desktop support and administration Migrated existing site wireless network with 80211n Windows Server 2008 MS Exchange 20032007 administrator Maintained company Active Directory and Email systems for HQSite Managed mail flow SPAM filteringusing Aria SPAM solution Outlook support and securityusing Al tools Security for 300 mailboxes Education Associate in Computer networking COLLEGE OF TECHNOLOGY New York NY COMPUTER SCIENCE LAGUARDIA COLLEGE Skills Bgp Cisco Dhcp Eigrp Lanwan Ospf Router Tcp Tcpip Vmware Vpn Dns Firewalls Networking Security Sso Ssl Hsrp Ids Ipsec Active Directory Technical Support Windows Windows 7 Customer Service Microsoft Office MAC access CertificationsLicenses A Certified 2003 to Present CCNA Routing and Switching April 2009 to April 2011 ITIL v3 September 2011 to Present MCSE September 2014 to September 2017 Assessments Supervisory Skills Directing Others Familiar July 2019 Measures a candidates ability to motivate the performance of others through feedback to identify improvements or corrective actions Full results
